about_the_game:
A shroud of chilling despair cloaks the nights, and the days are filled with an unseen tension. The whole world is gripped in the clutches of barely repressed primal fear. A cult gathers round a grotesque idol, coldly repeating chants foreign to the human tongue.

Who will stop their horrific summons?




1-900-CULT is a stand-alone total conversion modification of Dennaton Games' Hotline Miami.

Carefully rebuilt to match up to the lightning fast decision making and risk taking of 2015's Hotline Miami 2, 1-900-CULT expands upon the mechanics and features of the Hotline Miami series with multiple brand new character playstyles, numerous mechanical overhauls, new and expanded enemy types, and brand new levels full of ultra-violent mayhem. All of these elements are brought together to present a fresh challenge to Hotline Miami fans, new or old.




  • Multiple unique characters and styles to master
  • An incredible and varied soundtrack
  • New combo-oriented unlocks and abilities, push yourself to earn a variety of character-specific rewards by earning larger and larger combos
  • 20+ new weapons, all with unique features and mechanics
  • Overhauled returning enemy types, including re-balanced and expanded Fats, Dodgers, Hiders, and more
  • 10+ new game-changing enemy types, specifically designed to threaten and challenge the player in never before seen ways
  • A full length campaign of carefully designed levels, full of secrets and surprises
  • Countless mechanical and quality of life changes
  • In-engine level editor built from the ground up for level creators, by level creators

content_descriptors.notes: This game features frequent pixelated depictions of extreme violence, including blood and gore, as well as body horror. Also present are mature themes and scenes including drug and alcohol use, swearing, the occult, and some sexual themes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 256MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Ownership of Hotline Miami is required to install and play 1-900-CULT.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 512MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
